titles.title: Responsible Online Voter Empowerment Registration Act of 2010
To direct the Election Assistance Commission to make payments to reimburse States for costs incurred in establishing online voter registration programs, and for other purposes.
Responsible Online Voter Empowerment Registration Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Responsible Online Voter Empowerment Act of 2010 - Directs the Election Assistance Commission to reimburse each eligible state for the costs incurred in establishing, if it so chooses, an online voter registration program meeting specified requirements.
